purpose: Facilitates the integration of AI into various workflows using a no-code, actor-based approach.
principle: Utilizes the actor model to create dynamic, graph-based solutions that enable flexible AI workflow integration.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with plug-and-play components, supports API integrations for extensibility.
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have stability issues and limited documentation.
name: craftgen
description: Integrating AI into every workflow with our open-source, no-code platform, powered by the actor model for dynamic, graph-based solutions.
highlight: Open-source, no-code platform leveraging the actor model for dynamic, graph-based AI solutions.
